[Ancestral Blood Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1810) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 139 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The magic of your bloodline mixes with that of your ancestry. You gain your blood magic effect when you cast a non-cantrip spell you gained from a heritage or an ancestry feat, in addition to the normal circumstances that trigger your blood magic.

<title level="2">Ancestral Blood Magic leads to...</title>
[Ancestral Mage](/Feats.aspx?ID=1820)
